name: ext_R4B_MedicationKnowledge_kinetics
title: Cross-version Extension for R4B.MedicationKnowledge.kinetics for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents MedicationKnowledge.kinetics from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicationKnowledge|4.3.0 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: The time course of drug absorption, distribution, metabolism and excretion of a medication from the body
element.definition: `MedicationKnowledge.kinetics` has no related element in R5:MedicationKnowledge
